page.title: 13VILLAGE SUB-POST OFFICES
page.content: {Newland Post Office Stores}is owned and run by{Mr. and Mrs.Bromhead. They sell cigarettes, grocery, includ- ing high class items, confectionery, maps, Newland keyrings and postcards. Opening hours are 9.00-1.00 and 2.00- 5.30,except for Tuesday and Thursday afternoons.As few children live in Newland, customers are mainly adults. Half of the customers buy their weekly shopping in the shop because they prefer to support the village shop. The rest probably use nearby super- markets in{Monmouth}or{Coleford}and buy single items in the village shop. {Penallt Post Office}is in the sitting room of{Mrs. Frost's}500 year old Welsh long house in Lone Lane. The Post Office used to be in the village but the sub-postmistress retired and the property was sold.
